thread.section_title: Hudson Reed USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hudson Reed USA | usa.hudsonreed.com
thread.title: hollie brostek
thread.title_full: Hudson Reed USA reviewed by hollie brostek

author: hollie brostek
title: hollie brostek
text: Working with Hudson Reed was a very pleasant experience. I had the opportunity to contact customer care as the package was returned after 3 unsuccessful delivery attempts. They were very helpful and courteous in getting my products re-shipped as prompt as possible. United Parcel Service(UPS) who delivered the product was an entirely different experience as when I called after the second attempt I was incorrectly informed the product would be available for pickup at the facility rather than sent back to Hudson Reed.
